Steps To Reproduce:
1. Download Windows AC 4.4.0.3
2. On the command line, run SetConfig and accept the defaults.
3. Type 'setconfig -help' on the command line.

The result of this is to get the parameter list message, with the following at the end of the list.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.config.SetConfig.printPlugi
nHelp(SetConfig.java:1413)
        at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.config.SetConfig.generateCo
nfig(SetConfig.java:66)
        at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.config.SetConfig.main(SetCo
nfig.java:52)
